first_para: Kelvin Peter Hopkins (born 22 August 1941) is a British Labour Party politician, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Luton North since 1997. Hopkins is known for his rebellious stance amongst Labour MPs

full.extract: Kelvin Peter Hopkins (born 22 August 1941) is a British Labour Party politician, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Luton North since 1997. Hopkins is known for his rebellious stance amongst Labour MPs
full.title: Kelvin Hopkins
